bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXII (Nos 2309-2353)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Lobel E. and C.H. Roberts, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XXII (Nos 2309-2353). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 31.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1954, 8°, xiii-181 pp. et XI pll.

C.R. par John Barns, JHS 76 (1956) pp. 119-120. - John A. Davison, CR N.S., 6 (1956) pp. 12-14. - Édouard des Places, Orientalia N.S., 24 (1955) pp. 433-434. - Kurt Latte, Gnomon 27 (1955) pp. 491-499; - 608 [reproduit dans: Kleine Schriften (München, 1968) pp. 787-795]. - Naphtali Lewis, AJP 77 (1956) pp. 329-331. - S.J. Lurie, VDI 69 (1959, fasc. 3) pp. 191-198. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 30 (1955) No. 60, pp. 385-391. - Verne B. Schuman, CP 54 (1959) pp. 204-205. - Edoardo Volterra, Iura 8 (1957) pp. 558-565. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 73 (1956) pp. 392-400.
